All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDao<T>
Abstract DAO (Data Access Object) class for database operations on a specific entity type.
AppEntryPoint
Entry point for the application.
Bill
Represents a bill associated with an order.
BillDao
Data Access Object (DAO) for handling CRUD operations related to Bill entities in the database.
Client
Represents a client.
ClientController
 
ClientDao
Data Access Object (DAO) for handling CRUD operations related to Client entities in the database.
ClientEntry
Represents an entry for a client in the table, wrapping a Client object.
ClientRepository
Repository for handling CRUD operations related to Client entities in the database.
ClientValidator
Validator class for validating client creation.
Database
Utility class for managing database connections, as a singleton
EditCell<S,T>
A custom TableCell implementation for editing content within a TableView.
MainController
Controller class for handling the main view of the application.
Order
Represents an order.
OrderController
Controller for the order view.
OrderDao
Data Access Object (DAO) for handling CRUD operations related to Order entities in the database.
OrderEntry
Represents an entry for an order in the table, wrapping an Order object.
OrderRepository
Repository for handling CRUD operations related to Order entities in the database.
OrderValidator
Validator class for validating order creation.
Product
Represents a product.
ProductController
Controller for the product view.
ProductDao
Data Access Object (DAO) for handling CRUD operations related to Product entities in the database.
ProductEntry
Represents an entry for a product in the table, wrapping a Product object.
ProductRepository
Repository for handling CRUD operations related to Product entities in the database.
ProductValidator
Validator class for validating product creation.
